laboratory_examinations.findings: Mostly normal, with the exception of mild anemia and a higher D-dimer.
Obvious enlargement of the left heart and right atrium, massive tricuspid regurgitation (14.9 cm2), and elevated pulmonary artery systolic pressure (42 mmHg).
No pulmonary arterial hypertension with a mean pulmonary artery pressure of 20 mmHg, a pulmonary capillary wedge pressure of 9 mmHg, and a pulmonary vascular resistance of 2.16 Wood.

laboratory_examinations.date: Approximately 10 months prior to the current admission
laboratory_examinations.findings: Compared to the prior CT scan, the abnormal dilated vascular mass in the lower lobe of the right lung showed postoperative change.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Enhanced magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the abdomen

laboratory_examinations.findings: Detected heterozygous variants of the ACVRL1 gene c.1358del (p.N453T) in exon9, which has pathogenic significance according to biological analysis.
